attributes.action: make sure british jobs go to our british children when they leave school as mine cant get a job due to being overun by migrant workers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are no jobs in East Anglia for school leavers. They are mostly taken by Polish or Portugese migrants. This is not fair. British Jobs should go to british people first and not cheap migrant labour that sends our currency abroad.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
